materials.raw_text:
B: 20 g
Ce: 10 g
Ni: 15 g
Tb: 5 g

sourcing.instructions:

Ce: Obtain from a chemical supplier.
Ni: Available at metal supply shops.
Tb: Order from a specialized rare earth material vendor.
